sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( SYS_ID ,GRP_CD ,DTL_CD ) AS ( SELECT '100' ,'CHK_USER' ,'AUTH' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN INSTR(B.REM, #reg_id#) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END DEV_AUTH ,CASE WHEN INSTR(D.REM, #reg_id#) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END DEGR_YN ,CASE WHEN INSTR(E.REM, #reg_id#) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END TESTING_YN ,CASE WHEN INSTR(F.REM, #reg_id#) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHECKING_YN ,B.REM ,SUBSTRING(C.REM, 1, 4) COME ,SUBSTRING(C.REM, 6) S_KEY ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDDT B ON B.SYS_ID = A.SYS_ID AND B.GRP_CD = A.GRP_CD AND B.DTL_CD = A.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDDT C ON C.SYS_ID = '100' AND C.GRP_CD = 'CHK_USER' AND C.DTL_CD = 'WORK' LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDDT D ON D.SYS_ID = '100' AND D.GRP_CD = 'CHK_USER' AND D.DTL_CD = 'DEGR' LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDDT E ON E.SYS_ID = '100' AND E.GRP_CD = 'CHK_USER' AND E.DTL_CD = 'TESTING' LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDDT F ON F.SYS_ID = '100' AND F.GRP_CD = 'CHK_USER' AND F.DTL_CD = 'CHECKING'

WITH T1 ( SYS_ID ,GRP_CD ,DTL_CD ) AS ( SELECT '100', 'CHK_USER', 'WORK' FROM DUAL ) SELECT SUBSTRING(B.REM ,1 ,4) CURR_COME ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDDT B ON B.SYS_ID = A.SYS_ID AND B.GRP_CD = A.GRP_CD AND B.DTL_CD = A.DTL_CD
